key_talking_points: Penalty on Florida's Aaron Ekblad for holding the stick. Edmonton will go on the power play early in the first period with 17:06 remaining.
The score is 5-4 in favor of Florida. A power play goal here for Edmonton could tie the game early.
Recent shot on goal by Corey Perry was stopped by Sergei Bobrovsky.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game is close with Florida leading by one goal, and a penalty has just been called against Florida. This creates a power play opportunity for Edmonton early in the first period. Momentum is moderate due to the penalty and shot on goal.

high_intensity_events.summary: Penalty: A. Ekblad (FLA) holding-the-stick at 02:54 (2 min)

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the upcoming power play and its potential impact on the game. Also mention the recent shot on goal. Briefly set the stage for the importance of this game in the season.
